DOC.brief_summary: The objective study : - To compare change level tear proteins inflammatory mediator pre post administration intranasal extranasal application - To compare goblet cell count follow application intranasal extranasal application - To compare fluorescein tear clearance application device intranasally extranasally application
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Trial Evaluating Quality Tears Produced Nasal Neurostimulation
DOC.detailed_description: In study , subject participate three study day 44 day period , consist screen examination determine eligibility one day study application two different day . There two application , intranasal extranasal . Subjects receive application , random sequence , one two application day ( Visit 2 Visit 3 ) . The two application consist : - Active intranasal device application - Active extranasal device application
DOC.criteria: Bilateral dry eye Capable provide write informed consent Chronic recur epistaxis ( nosebleed ) Blood coagulation disorder Uncontrolled poorly control diabetes Heart pulmonary disease Females pregnant , plan pregnancy nursing
